data.author: Aditi Bharade
data.title: Trump says Powell probe should continue: 'Take it to the end and see'
data.description: Earlier in January, the DOJ served the Federal Reserve subpoenas threatening criminal indictment over the Fed's renovation expenses.
data.content:
Trump said he wants to continue the probe into Jerome Powell.Chip Somodevilla/Getty Images

data.title: Even Disney can't outrun the international travel slowdown
data.description: Disney reported "headwinds" in international visitation to its American parks as foreign travelers continue to avoid the US.
data.content:
Looks like even "The Most Magical Place on Earth" isn't enough to entice foreign travelers who are skipping the US.
Disney is facing some "international visitation headwinds" at its parks in the US,… [+2797 chars]

data.title: US-India trade agreement lifts outlook for stocks and rupee; GIFT Nifty jumps 4.5%
data.description: Market participants see the accord, combined with a pro-growth Union Budget, as a catalyst for renewed foreign inflows after months of underperformance and record outflows
data.content: Indian equities are primed to narrow their rare underperformance versus Asian peers after New Delhi and Washington clinched a long-awaited trade agreement, removing a key overhang that had weighed on… [+3578 chars]
